titleStmt.title: The Kings censure upon recusants that refuse the sacrament of the Lords Supper. Delivered in three sermons, containing a refutation of some dangerous common errors, and a remonstration of the duties of administration and participation of that holy sacrament. Proving the necessity of receiving it. Reproving the neglect and contempt of it. Disproving the exceptions and excuses alleged against either the giving or taking of it. Set forth to publick view for the hungry and thirsty souls sake that desire to be satisfyed. By Thomas Marshal minister of the doctrin [sic] and sacraments of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Marshall, Thomas, 1621-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Cowles in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
